divs: Sighting DetailsIt looked like a shooting star then dimmed to like a satellite would look two diffrent times two diffrent weeks, same time of night, same place in the sky.
Summary: I witnessed on two seprate occasions the same thing the second time my girlfriend witnessed it also.
